content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-5.5, 0.0) (currently working with 21 coal)
- Steam engine at (-1.5, 0.5) (working status)
- Connected pipe network (fluid system 427) spanning multiple positions
- Small electric pole at (-1.5, 2.5) providing power distribution

### Pipe Network (fluid system 427)
- Extensive pipe connections between power generation components
- Key pipe positions: (-8.5,-0.5), (-7.5,-0.5), (-5.5,-1.5), (2.5,-0.5), (-7.5,0.5), (1.5,0.5)
- Carrying steam at 165° temperature

### Electricity Distribution Network (id 4169)
- Multiple small electric poles spanning across the map
- Key pole positions: (6.5,66.5), (27.5,66.5), (8.5,68.5), (24.5,25.5), (-1.5,26.5), (26.5,27.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Build location finding failures (repeated in steps 16-23)
- Implement more robust location scanning algorithms that account for:
  - Existing entity footprints
  - Terrain obstacles
  - Power network proximity
  - Resource patch locations
- Consider pre-scanning and caching valid build areas
- Implement fallback location strategies when primary locations fail

### Power system maintenance
- Monitor boiler fuel levels (currently 21 coal) to prevent power interruptions
- Verify all pipe connections remain intact after modifications
- Maintain proper steam temperature and flow rates

### General construction improvements
- Implement entity placement validation before attempting builds
- Develop better error recovery when placement fails
- Consider building in less congested areas first

### Previous error tips still applicable:
- Belt connection validation
- Entity placement checks
- Mining operation setup
- Power system connections
- Code implementation practices
